tag_list: marketing, marketing-consultant, keynote-speaker, radio-announcer, journalist, writer
overview: Steve Davis is Marketing Director at Baker Marketing in Adelaide, South Australia. He is also founder and espresso evangelist for Baristador Coffee. Steve is also a social media and internet commentator for Adelaide radio station FIVEaa. He is a keynote speaker on topics related to marketing, marketing strategy, social media marketing and writing for publication. The first half of his career was spent as a journalist and radio announcer. He moved into marketing mid-career, commencing work as a marketing consultant and workshop facilitator. He also completed an MBA Markeitng Management to complement the transition.
